alert.note: Alert for St. John The Baptist; Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 3:21PM CDT until September 23 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 321 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ponchatoula, or 9 miles southeast of Hammond, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ponchatoula and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 43 and 47. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 4 and 25. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
